metadata.title: Hawaii T-Shirt Vintage Sports Design Hawaiian Islands HI Tee
features: Solid colors: 100% Cotton; Heather Grey: 90% Cotton, 10% Polyester; All Other Heathers: 50% Cotton, 50% Polyester
Vintage Hawaii T-Shirt - Available in Mens, Womens, Kids Tees.
Hawaii T-Shirt with state of Hawaii, year established and state motto the Aloha State
Lightweight, Classic fit, Double-needle sleeve and bottom hem
description: Vintage Hawaii t-shirt with a classic distressed and worn retro look. The Hawaii vintage t-shirt design makes an excellent patriotic clothing choice. This unique vintage t-shirt also makes a great gift idea for those who are proud to be from and those who love Hawaii.
metadata.details: {"Package Dimensions": "10 x 8 x 1 inches; 4.8 Ounces", "Department": "Unisex-child", "Date First Available": "May 30, 2017", "Manufacturer": "Jim Shorts"}
